skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn if the target does not have any active buffs. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 2 turns if the target does have any active buffs.

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of decreasing the duration of all enemy buffs by 2 turns. 

Increases the duration of all [Increase DEF] buffs on allies by 1 turn.

skills.desc:
At the start of each turn, places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff for 2 turns on the ally with the lowest MAX HP. Will not be placed on this Champion.

Also places a 25% [Strengthen] buff and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Heartstrong [P]
